short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deckbox Companion adds quick links to Magic: The Gathering card markets and sites while browsing decks and cards on deckbox.org.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deckbox Companion is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your deckbox.org experience. It provides quick links to popular Magic: The Gathering card markets and related sites, giving you easy access to card prices, deck analysis, and moreâ€”all while browsing your decks and collections on deckbox.org. Simplify your MTG deck management and stay connected with the broader card market in just a few clicks.
